projects.name: Mazze solver using Dijkstra Algorithm
projects.description: Maze solver using Dijkstra's Algorithm efficiently finds the shortest path through a maze by systematically exploring the nodes with the lowest accumulated cost, ensuring an optimal route. This algorithm is particularly effective for navigating through complex mazes.

projects.name: Psychological therapist chatbot using NLP and Transformers
projects.description: Built an advanced chatbot using NLP and Transformers like BERT. Implemented tokenization and cosine similarity for empathetic responses, offering personalized mental health support.

projects.name: Smart Ring for the women safety
projects.description: Developed an IoT system integrated with a mobile application to monitor heart rate through a ring with a manual button. The system proactively alerts parents to any abnormal pulse rates and, upon button press, instantly shares the wearer's current location while providing live camera access for real-time visual confirmation.

projects.name: Java Full Stack Project
projects.description: Done a sample project and deployed a servlet to train Java Full Stack skills.

projects.name: Various Data Handling and Data Science Projects

experiences.description: Developed a machine learning model to classify SMS messages as spam or ham using NLP techniques. Conducted time series analysis and forecasting using ARIMA models. Implemented a CNN to classify images of cats and dogs with TensorFlow/Keras.
Created a Netflix Clone, Amazon Clone, Logic page and Portfolio.
